Text:
Thanks for the feedback, everyone.

In a different venue, my efforts here have resulted in me being characterized as a "slacker." So, your positive feedback here is even more valued by me.

On another note...
There was no 3/5 CWKO program.

3/6 will have a special 3-hour CWKO Super Tuesday coverage program, but I will not be posting it. By the time I finally got it uploaded, it wouldn't be news...it would be "olds," and much would likely have changed in terms of election results.

My next CWKO post will be on 3/7.

Thanks for the clarification.  You are the absolute best, and I cannot thank you enough for all of your hard work!  You can count on my appreciation and support as long as I'm around.  (I am about to go into the hospital here in Austria for a couple of days - I wonder if they have a wireless LAN area...)
